<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legalizationartifactcombiner/#a79837ead25e5a97d27a176df66809a5b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legalizationartifactcombiner/#a79837ead25e5a97d27a176df66809a5b">canFoldMergeOpcode</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MergeOp, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ConvertOp,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> OpTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> DestTy) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we found a definition that is like G&#95;MERGE&#95;VALUES.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MergeOp) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetOpcode::G&#95;BUILD&#95;VECTOR:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetOpcode::G&#95;MERGE&#95;VALUES:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The convert operation that we will need to insert is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// going to convert the input of that type of instruction (scalar)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the destination type (DestTy).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The conversion needs to stay in the same domain (scalar to scalar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and vector to vector), so if we were to allow to fold the merge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we would need to insert some bitcasts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E.g.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;2 x s16&gt; = build&#95;vector s16, s16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;2 x s32&gt; = zext &lt;2 x s16&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;2 x s16&gt;, &lt;2 x s16&gt; = unmerge &lt;2 x s32&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As is the folding would produce:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;2 x s16&gt; = zext s16  &lt;-- scalar to vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;2 x s16&gt; = zext s16  &lt;-- scalar to vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Which is invalid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instead we would want to generate:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// s32 = zext s16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;2 x s16&gt; = bitcast s32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// s32 = zext s16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;2 x s16&gt; = bitcast s32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// That is not done yet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ConvertOp == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !DestTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a7da5cc6e8aadd4d5fb6dd68f8ec12b7e">isVector</a>() &amp;&amp; OpTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a7da5cc6e8aadd4d5fb6dd68f8ec12b7e">isVector</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">             DestTy == OpTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#aa24450f600cabd7212bd264a6dbc190c">getElementType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetOpcode::G&#95;CONCAT&#95;VECTORS: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ConvertOp == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DestTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a7da5cc6e8aadd4d5fb6dd68f8ec12b7e">isVector</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Given an concat&#95;vector op \\p Concat and a start bit and size, try to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// find the origin of the value defined by that start position and size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// \\returns a register with the requested size, or the current best</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// register found during the current query.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> findValueFromConcat(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gconcatvectors">GConcatVectors</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86interleavedaccess-cpp/#a76c9562101f54d25482f88ae29ed6131">Concat</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartBit,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Operand index of the source that provides the start of the bit range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartSrcIdx = (StartBit / SrcSize) + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Offset into the source at which the bit range starts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InRegOffset = StartBit % SrcSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that the bits don&#39;t span multiple sources.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: we might be able return multiple sources? Or create an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// appropriate concat to make it fit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InRegOffset + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; SrcSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurrentBest;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> SrcReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86interleavedaccess-cpp/#a76c9562101f54d25482f88ae29ed6131">Concat</a>.getReg(StartSrcIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InRegOffset == 0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> == SrcSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CurrentBest = SrcReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> findValueFromDefImpl(SrcReg, 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> findValueFromDefImpl(SrcReg, InRegOffset, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Given an build&#95;vector op \\p BV and a start bit and size, try to find</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// the origin of the value defined by that start position and size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// \\returns a register with the requested size, or the current best</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// register found during the current query.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> findValueFromBuildVector(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gbuildvector">GBuildVector</a> &amp;BV, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartBit,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the source operand that provides the bits requested.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Src1Reg = BV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gmergelikeinstr/#a226d638a0e8ab52846285f8a24e3c9f5">getSourceReg</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcSize = MRI.getType(Src1Reg).getSizeInBits();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Operand index of the source that provides the start of the bit range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartSrcIdx = (StartBit / SrcSize) + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Offset into the source at which the bit range starts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InRegOffset = StartBit % SrcSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InRegOffset != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurrentBest; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Give up, bits don&#39;t start at a scalar source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &lt; SrcSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurrentBest; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scalar source is too large for requested bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the bits cover multiple sources evenly, then create a new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// build&#95;vector to synthesize the required size, if that&#39;s been requested.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; SrcSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> % SrcSize &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurrentBest; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Isn&#39;t covered exactly by sources.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumSrcsUsed = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> / SrcSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;re requesting all of the sources, just return this def.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumSrcsUsed == BV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gmergelikeinstr/#a90d314382626dec7379b4d2ec02b7a4b">getNumSources</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericmachineinstr/#a2cdf10ff4f5fb865c6a669331aeb5846">getReg</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> SrcTy = MRI.getType(Src1Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> NewBVTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#acd1eca3232b7b3072543294cd2377a37">LLT::fixed&#95;vector</a>(NumSrcsUsed, SrcTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the resulting build vector would be legal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalizeactionstep">LegalizeActionStep</a> ActionStep =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">            LI.getAction(&#123;TargetOpcode::G&#95;BUILD&#95;VECTOR, &#123;NewBVTy, SrcTy&#125;&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ActionStep.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalizeactionstep/#a1ad3bef7dbfe7e650af077cede882b93">Action</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/legalizeactions/#a834a0e3032e20fe88a0c931e8f246654a167074ba3b742859ff5dbe464381e107">LegalizeActions::Legal</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurrentBest;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Register&gt;</a> NewSrcs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcIdx = StartSrcIdx; SrcIdx &lt; StartSrcIdx + NumSrcsUsed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">             ++SrcIdx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">          NewSrcs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(BV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericmachineinstr/#a2cdf10ff4f5fb865c6a669331aeb5846">getReg</a>(SrcIdx));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MIB.setInstrAndDebugLoc(BV);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MIB.buildBuildVector(NewBVTy, NewSrcs).getReg(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A single source is requested, just return it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericmachineinstr/#a2cdf10ff4f5fb865c6a669331aeb5846">getReg</a>(StartSrcIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Given an G&#95;INSERT op \\p MI and a start bit and size, try to find</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// the origin of the value defined by that start position and size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// \\returns a register with the requested size, or the current best</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// register found during the current query.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> findValueFromInsert(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartBit,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() == TargetOpcode::G&#95;INSERT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ContainerSrcReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(1).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> InsertedReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(2).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> InsertedRegTy = MRI.getType(InsertedReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InsertOffset = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(3).getImm();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are 4 possible container/insertreg + requested bit-range layouts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that the instruction and query could be representing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For: %&#95; = G&#95;INSERT %CONTAINER, %INS, InsOff (abbrev. to &#39;IO&#39;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and a start bit &#39;SB&#39;, with size S, giving an end bit &#39;EB&#39;, we could</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scenario A:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   --------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |  INS    |  CONTAINER     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   --------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       |   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       SB  EB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scenario B:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   --------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |  INS    |  CONTAINER     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   --------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                |    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                SB   EB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scenario C:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   --------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |  CONTAINER    |  INS     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   --------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       |    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       SB   EB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scenario D:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   --------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |  CONTAINER    |  INS     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   --------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     |   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     SB  EB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So therefore, A and D are requesting data from the INS operand, while</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// B and C are requesting from the container operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InsertedEndBit = InsertOffset + InsertedRegTy.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a956ffd0de93798f523683b447646dd92">getSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EndBit = StartBit + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewStartBit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> SrcRegToUse;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EndBit &lt;= InsertOffset || InsertedEndBit &lt;= StartBit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SrcRegToUse = ContainerSrcReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewStartBit = StartBit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> findValueFromDefImpl(SrcRegToUse, NewStartBit, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InsertOffset &lt;= StartBit &amp;&amp; EndBit &lt;= InsertedEndBit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SrcRegToUse = InsertedReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewStartBit = StartBit - InsertOffset;</span></CodeLine>
